name: Nano Voider (Black_Valor)
description: I made this during GMTK gamejam, I made the art, music and programmed it myself. its a Lite real time strategy style game, where you command 3 Robots to clean up and contain quickly spreading nanobot growth, you play as a command repair bot who's job is maintain the robots while they contain the nanobot growth, be warn! the nano growth will go out of control~
